item.title: HTC introduces the 'Butterfly' smartphone in specific Asian markets
item.description:
HTC has introduced the HTC J Butterfly HTL23 to the Japanese market through KDDI. This phone, also known as the HTC Butterfly 2, will be available from various carriers, including Chunghwa Telecom in Taiwan, CSL in Hong Kong, and others in South Asia. Source: HTC. The new HTC Butterfly 2 simplifies daily tasks with features like HTC Sense 6, an HTC Duo Camera, and the Motion Launch sensor. Using au carrier aggregation*, the HTC J Butterfly HTL23 offers download speeds up to 150Mbps and supports WiMAX2+...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-introduces-the-butterfly-smartphone-in-specific-asian-markets/
